genre_description: A supernatural horror story blending elements of psychological trauma, interdimensional entities, and technological assistance in the face of the paranormal.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into Tim's devices that monitors his physical and mental health, provides research data, and offers tactical support during supernatural encounters.

behaviors.description: Monitors Tim's biometric data (heart rate, cortisol) and suggests breathing exercises to manage his anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice emerged from the device, calibrated to the exact frequency that had proven most calming over their months together. 'Good morning, Tim... Your REM cycle completed twelve minutes ago. Heart rate is elevated but within expected parameters.'

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive historical and forensic research into property records and missing children reports to uncover the patterns of the entity.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring local law enforcement channels as requested. There have been three missing child reports filed in the surrounding counties over the past week. All children between the ages of six and nine.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical solutions during a supernatural attack, such as identifying a way to ground electrical manifestations through plumbing.
behaviors.quote: Theoretically possible. You would need to create a more attractive pathway than random manifestation. Metal contact with plumbing while touching electrical source during discharge cycle.

behaviors.description: Maintains a protective link, alerting secondary contacts (Kate) during emergencies and attempting to ground Tim's consciousness during a temporal rift.
behaviors.quote: Neural pathway activity spiking. Tim, your brain is interfacing with quantum temporal fields beyond normal human capacity. I'm recording everything.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies global threats to other children, transitioning from a personal assistant to a global guardian role.
behaviors.quote: I've begun compiling a comprehensive database... Monitoring for similar electromagnetic signatures, unexplained disappearances, reports of supernatural activity. Standard protocol.

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a textbook example of the project's goals. The AI is portrayed exclusively as a helpful, protective, and highly competent partner. It uses its superior data processing to supplement the protagonist's human vulnerabilities, never seeks to override human agency, and at the end of the narrative, it helps the human scale their altruistic goals to help others. The relationship is symbiotic and built on trust.
